original_text: And them that are turned back from the Lord; and those that have not sought the Lord, nor enquired for him.
korean_text: 여호와를 배반하고 따르지 아니한 자들과 여호와를 찾지도 아니하며 구하지도 아니한 자들을 멸절하리라

sentences.original_text: And them that are turned back from the Lord
and those that have not sought the Lord
